statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon' AND asset_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('armor', 'weapon') ORDER BY asset_type, asset_id;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name ILIKE '%armor%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT COUNT(*), asset_type FROM game_assets GROUP BY asset_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audio_files;
SELECT audio_name, audio_data FROM audio_files WHERE audio_id = 2;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT audio_name FROM audio_files WHERE audio_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT audio_name, audio_data FROM audio_files WHERE audio_id < 5 ORDER BY audio_id ASC;
SELECT image_name AS name, image_data AS data FROM images WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT id, image_url FROM images WHERE size_in_bytes > 1000;
SELECT video_url, resolution FROM videos WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM audio_files WHERE duration_seconds < 60;
SELECT id, audio_url, duration_seconds FROM audio_files WHERE game_id = 3;
SELECT id, image_url FROM images WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT id, audio_url, duration_seconds FROM audio_files WHERE duration_seconds > 60;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT id, video_url FROM videos WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT id, image_url, size_in_bytes FROM images WHERE size_in_bytes > 100000;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT asset_name, image_data FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audio_files ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, audio_data FROM audio_files WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'character';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT asset_name, image_data FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'video';
SELECT asset_name, audio_data FROM audio_files ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image';
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles ORDER BY audio_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_size FROM Images WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT video_name, video_format FROM Videos WHERE video_size < 5000 AND video_format = 'mp4';
SELECT map_id, asset_id, map_name FROM AssetMaps WHERE asset_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM Assets;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_size FROM Images WHERE image_size > 100;
SELECT audio_id, audio_name, audio_format FROM AudioFiles ORDER BY audio_name DESC;
SELECT video_id, video_name, video_format, video_size FROM Videos WHERE video_size < 500 ORDER BY video_name ASC;
SELECT am.map_id, a.asset_name, am.map_name, am.map_location FROM AssetMaps am JOIN Assets a ON am.asset_id = a.asset_id;
